Text: Tonight, all three versions have audio out of sync.  This one is not as bad as the other two.
@notouchx    Thanks for the useful info. Getting this one based on your comments.

I'm not certain my reports are entirely accurate.  I check them on my PC using MPC-HC and VLC, then put them on a USB stick and watch them on my TV through my Oppo Blu-Ray player (no conversion necessary).  This time, this video was slightly out of sync on my PC but was perfectly in sync on the TV.
